title: Debuging the transaction that calls method of non existing code exits with panic
body:
### Component

Cast, Anvil

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [ ] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

_No response_

### What command(s) is the bug in?

cast send --debug

### Operating System

Linux

### Describe the bug

foundryup: installed - forge 0.2.0 (6fc7463 2024-01-05T00:21:51.712802723Z)
foundryup: installed - cast 0.2.0 (6fc7463 2024-01-05T00:21:51.718643672Z)
foundryup: installed - anvil 0.2.0 (6fc7463 2024-01-05T00:21:51.706678919Z)
foundryup: installed - chisel 0.2.0 (6fc7463 2024-01-05T00:21:51.726644879Z)

running towards local anvil 

```bash
üí§ cast send 0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8 "increment()" --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80

blockHash               0xb5724628d1d2fc8ae236076f5a6d6a0d094418ec95b4a8f929fddcec9271acd8
blockNumber             1
contractAddress         
cumulativeGasUsed       21064
effectiveGasPrice       4000000000
gasUsed                 21064
logs                    []
logsBloom               
root                    
status                  1
transactionHash         0x701aade4f053b0aa92c248182b9bcc1c4e5b22ad6caa1eb9704ad9e171eafdfe
transactionIndex        0
type                    2

üí§ cast run 0x701aade4f053b0aa92c248182b9bcc1c4e5b22ad6caa1eb9704ad9e171eafdfe
Executing previous transactions from the block.
Traces:
  [0] 0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8::increment()
    ‚îî‚îÄ ‚Üê ()


Transaction successfully executed.
Gas used: 21064

üí§ cast run 0x701aade4f053b0aa92c248182b9bcc1c4e5b22ad6caa1eb9704ad9e171eafdfe --debug
Executing previous transactions from the block.
The application panicked (crashed).
Message:  index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0
Location: crates/debugger/src/tui/context.rs:64

This is a bug. Consider reporting it at https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry

Backtrace omitted. Run with RUST_BACKTRACE=1 environment variable to display it.
Run with RUST_BACKTRACE=full to include source snippets.
Aborted (core dumped)

```
